parameters.definition: Sale price of the full-weighted keyboard
Sale price of the semi-weighted keyboard
Total number of oscillator chips available per day
Number of oscillator chips required to produce one full-weighted keyboard
Number of oscillator chips required to produce one semi-weighted keyboard
Total available production time per day in hours
Production time required to produce one keyboard (regardless of type) in hours

description: A music company produces two types of digital keyboards, one is full-weighted and another is semi-weighted. Both keyboards are sold for \param{FullWeightedPrice} and \param{SemiWeightedPrice} respectively. There are about \param{TotalChips} oscillator chips available every day from which the full-weighted version requires \param{ChipsFullWeighted} chips while the semi-weighted version requires \param{ChipsSemiWeighted} chips. The company has a total of \param{TotalTime} working hours a day. Both of these keyboards require a production time of \param{ProductionTimePerKeyboard} hours. What should be the manufacturing quantity for each of the keyboards to maximize the total revenue?
